title: Silver 1, Support/Adc Main Looking for Team Ranked 5's
body:
Hello, Shiney Here. 

Been playing for a long time, I have a great understanding of the Support and Adc role. I'm willing to be a bench player if needed.

I don't use skype, mainly because it destroys my internet. I can use any other voice communication app and it works fine.

replies.body:
Yo im silver 5 and im wondering if you would care for ranked 5s and if you want to duo??
{{champion:67}} {{champion:267}}
Yeah I dont mind the duo ranked games, and im down for anything.
